item.title: Incarceration Rates in the USA
item.description: Introduction The data for this post comes from the Vera institute. It comes as a timely reminder of the racial injustice that still exists in the United States prison system. If anyone is looking to learn more about this topic, then I recommend watching the documentary ‘13th’ - the name refers to the Thirteenth Amendment of the United States Constitution, which abolished slavery throughout the United States and ended involuntary servitude except as a punishment for a crime.
